DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to test the hypothesis that addition of dexmedetomidine to fentanyl-based intravenous patient controlled analgesia (PCA) reduces requirement of fentanyl bolus and consequent postoperative nausea and vomiting in high-risk patients undergoing lumbar spine surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Combination Dexmedetomidine Added to Fentanyl-based Intravenous Patient-controlled Analgesia on Nausea Vomiting in Highly Susceptible Patients Undergoing Lumbar Spinal Surgery: Prospective Double Blinded Randomized Controlled Trial
